instructions: Use the form below to search for houses to buy. You can search by place-name, postcode, or tap the compass to search in your current location.
zero_properties: There were no properties found for the given location.
not_matched: The location given was not recognised.
location_not_enabled: The use of location is currently disabled.
location_not_found: Unable to detect current location. Please ensure location is turned on in your phone settings and try again.
error_offline: An error occurred while searching. Please check your network connection and try again.
